¶ And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall beat \w off|strong="H2251"\w* from the \w channel|strong="H7641"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* unto the \w stream|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and ye shall be \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* by \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, O ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
